duties_responsibilities.duty: Install, configure, and manage all aspects of the VMware Vsphere environment.
Monitor Network and Application Environments and generate Operations Reports.
Provide support for QA & Technical Support staff.
Perform regular system maintenance, hardware and software upgrades, and troubleshoot performance issues.
Troubleshoot Windows and ESX server OS issues and ensure/implement Information Security/Information Assurance policies.
Manage and complete assigned tasks and tickets in a timely and proficient manner.
